mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into per_sys_list (PER_ID, PER_NAME, PER_SEX, PER_AGE, PER_TYPE, PER_TEL_NUM, PER_NUM, PER_ADD, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG ) values (#{perId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{perType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perTelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update per_sys_list set PER_ID = #{perId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PER_NAME = #{perName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PER_SEX = #{perSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PER_AGE = #{perAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PER_TYPE = #{perType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PER_TEL_NUM = #{perTelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PER_NUM = #{perNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PER_ADD = #{perAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PER_SEQ = #{perSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select PER_SEQ, PER_ID, PER_NAME, PER_SEX, PER_AGE, PER_TYPE, PER_TEL_NUM, PER_NUM, PER_ADD, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG from per_sys_list where PER_SEQ = #{perSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select PER_SEQ, PER_ID, PER_NAME, PER_SEX, PER_AGE, PER_TYPE, PER_TEL_NUM, PER_NUM, PER_ADD, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG from per_sys_list
select PER_SEQ, PER_ID, PER_NAME, PER_SEX, PER_AGE, PER_TYPE, PER_TEL_NUM, PER_NUM, PER_ADD, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG from per_sys_list where PER_ID = #{perId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
